name: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
description: One of the most popular treks in the world, offering stunning close-up views of the Annapurna mountain range, Machhapuchhre, and Hiunchuli.

days.title: Arrival in Pokhara
days.description: Arrive in Pokhara, check into your hotel, and make final preparations for the trek. Enjoy a boat ride on Phewa Lake.

days.title: Drive to Nayapul & Trek to Ghandruk
days.description: A scenic drive to Nayapul, followed by a trek to the beautiful Gurung village of Ghandruk. (Approx. 5-6 hours).

days.title: Trek to Chhomrong
days.description: Trek through lush forests and cross the Kimrong Khola to reach Chhomrong, a village with stunning views of Annapurna South.

days.title: Trek to Dovan
days.description: Descend the Chhomrong stone steps and then climb up to Sinuwa. Continue through a dense bamboo forest to Dovan.

days.title: Trek to Machhapuchhre Base Camp (MBC)
days.description: Ascend through the Modi Khola valley, passing the Hinku Cave. The valley widens as you reach MBC.

days.title: Trek to Annapurna Base Camp (ABC)
days.description: A short, 2-hour trek to ABC (4,130m). Spend the day acclimatizing and soaking in the 360-degree panoramic views.

days.title: Trek down to Bamboo
days.description: Wake up for a stunning sunrise over the Annapurnas, then begin your descent back down to the village of Bamboo.

days.title: Trek to Jhinu Danda (Hot Springs)
days.description: Continue descending to Chhomrong and then down to Jhinu Danda. Relax in the natural hot springs by the river.

days.title: Trek to Nayapul & Drive to Pokhara
days.description: A final short trek to Nayapul, then drive back to Pokhara to celebrate the completion of your trek.

name: Kathmandu Valley Cultural Tour
description: Explore the UNESCO World Heritage Sites of the Kathmandu Valley, discovering ancient temples, palaces, and living traditions.

days.title: Arrival & Swayambhunath
days.description: Arrive in Kathmandu and visit Swayambhunath (Monkey Temple) for a panoramic sunset view of the city.

days.title: Pashupatinath & Boudhanath
days.description: Witness morning rituals at the sacred Pashupatinath Temple, then visit the massive, peaceful Boudhanath Stupa.

days.title: Patan & Kathmandu Durbar Squares
days.description: Explore the ancient royal palaces and temples of Patan Durbar Square and Kathmandu Durbar Square.

days.title: Bhaktapur & Departure
days.description: Visit the beautifully preserved medieval city of Bhaktapur Durbar Square before departing.

name: Everest Base Camp Trek
description: The mother of all treks. Follow in the footsteps of legends to the base of the world's tallest peak.

name: Manaslu Circuit Trek
description: A remote and stunning trek around the world's 8th highest mountain, crossing the Larkya La pass.

name: Ghorepani Poon Hill Trek
description: A short and relatively easy trek with one of the most famous sunrise views over the Annapurna range.

name: Langtang Valley Trek
description: A beautiful trek through pine forests and rhododendron fields, close to Kathmandu, with rich Tamang culture.

name: Everest Three Passes Trek
description: The ultimate Everest experience, crossing three high passes: Renjo La, Cho La, and Kongma La. For experienced trekkers.

name: Gokyo Lakes Trek
description: A spectacular trek to the series of high-altitude emerald-green lakes in the Everest region, with an optional climb of Gokyo Ri.

name: Kanchenjunga Base Camp Trek
description: A remote and challenging expedition to the base of the world's third-highest mountain in Eastern Nepal.

name: Makalu Base Camp Trek
description: A strenuous trek into the remote Makalu Barun National Park, home to the world's fifth-highest mountain.

name: Chisapani Nagarkot Trek
description: A popular short trek on the rim of the Kathmandu Valley, offering great sunrise views and a visit to Dhap Dam Lake.

name: Nagarkot Dhulikhel Trekking
description: A brief and easy walk between two famous viewpoints, Nagarkot and Dhulikhel, offering rich culture and mountain vistas.

name: Kathmandu Valley Ridge Trek
description: A longer trek that circles the entire Kathmandu Valley, staying in hilltop towns and enjoying continuous mountain views.

name: Shivapuri National Park Hike
description: A quick getaway into the protected forest north of Kathmandu, perfect for birdwatching and peaceful walks.

name: Dhampus Sarangkot Australian Base Camp Hike
description: A classic short trek near Pokhara, offering spectacular, up-close views of the Annapurna and Fishtail mountains.
